post:
July 05, 2013 marks our very first anniversary, words can't express how excited and happy we feel. We have been waiting for this day to come for us all to celebrate. We just can't believe that through all the ups and downs, we've made it through, and now we're here, growing stronger and stronger each passing day. We would like to give a huge thanks to all our clients and everybody who support(s/ed) us, it is through the continued patronage of our products and services that we are able to grow and continue to provide best quality hosting solutions at an affordable price.

For our way to show our gratitude for having you(our clients) with us, we are running a special promotion in light of this event. Please see the promotion code below for a 60% LIFETIME DISCOUNT. Also, if you submit a ticket to our sales department mentioning this thread, you will recieve a FREE 20GB RAID-10 DISKSPACE, FREE 200GB BANDWIDTH, and a FREE ADDITIONAL IP for the length of your service. Only valid until July 16, 2013 or while supplies last.
Click to expand...

FRAPHOST WEBHOSTING SOLUTIONS - https://www.fraphost.com
FrapHost was established on the goal to provide high quality hosting services for everyone. We believe that providing high quality services should come at an affordable price. For this reason we have provided exceptional plans, at the lowest prices, for the best services possible, on our fastest nodes ever.

WHAT MAKES US STAND OUT AMONG THE SEA OF HOSTING PROVIDERS?
Quality - We only use top of the line servers on a top-tier facility for high quality performance.
Reliability - Support technicians are always ready and on standby to assist our clients.
Guaranteed Resources - We have ample of resources to cater thousands of clients, but we do not sell more than what we can provide. All the specifications and resources listed in our all of our plans are guaranteed.
Price Lock Guarantee - Any plan you purchase will stay at that same price for the length of your stay with us, except if it was terminated, or if you plan to upgrade/downgrade to another plan.
Satisfaction Guarantee - Try our services now risk free. If something seem to fail your expectations and you are not satisfied, prove to us and you get your money back. This will be on a case-to-case basis.
Premium Network - The network consists of Level3, Telia, XO, Cogent, and more that are actively route optimized to ensure optimal latency, throughput and overall performance.

OUR NODES WILL RUN THE FOLLOWING SPECIFICATIONS:
Intel Xeon E3-1240v2 w/ HT @ 3.4 GHz w/ Smart Cache 8MB
4 SATA3 Drives on RAID-10
HIGH ECC DDR3 RAM
Supermicro Enterprise Chassis
Turbo Frequency 3.8 GHz
4 Cores + 8 Thread

Please take a look at our plans below. We are currently running a special anniversary promotion that grants you a recurring 40% discount on any plans on 12-Month and even more discount on a 24-Month billing cycle. This promotion is only valid until July 17, 2013 or while supplies last.

ALL OUR FHVS VIRTUAL SERVER PLANS INCLUDE:
SolusVM Control Panel
OpenVZ Virtualization
High Performance Node
Upgrade Options
Choice of Operating System
Unlimited OS Reloads
Unlimited Reboots / Console
Remote VM Control (Shutdown / Restart)
rDNS (AUR)
TUN/TAP Enabled
PPP Enabled
Private Nameservers Label
EagleEye Monitored Accounts
24/7 Reliable Support
Free Data Migrations
W/Q End-User Support
Top-tier Facility
And much more..
